Uses of Interface
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep.PepResponse

Packages that use PepResponse
org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep The goal of this "PepApi interface package" is to provide a set of interfaces that provide a framework that will simplify the creation of Policy Enforcement Points (PEPs) that use an underlying authorization provider that is accessed through the "AzApi" package. 
org.openliberty.openaz.pep This package is the OpenAz reference "implementation" of the OpenAz "PepApi interface package", and therefore generally contains implementation classes and only implementation-specific interfaces, also included is a PepApi tutorial that describes the approach to building a PepApi implementation for a specific authorization provider, as well as a 2nd Mapper tutorial that describes the overall approach to writing mappers. 
test

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep that return PepResponse
 PepResponse PepResponseFactory.createPepResponse(AzResponseContext responseContext, PepRequest pepRequest, PepRequestOperation operation)
          Create a PepResponse based on the AzResponseContext
 PepResponse PepResponseFactory.createPepResponse(java.util.Set<AzResourceActionAssociation> actionResourceAssociations, PepRequest pepRequest, boolean queryAllowed)
          Create a PepResponse based on the set of returned AzResourceActionAssociation objects.
 PepResponse PepRequest.decide()
          Calls the AzService for a decision and returns the information to the caller in the form of a PepResponse
 PepResponse DecisionHandler.decide(PepRequest request)
          Returns a PepResponse containing either a single or multiple decisions based on the PepRequestOperation that was used to create the PepRequest by the PepRequestFactory
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.azapi.pep with parameters of type PepResponse
 void PostDecisionHandler.postDecide(PepRequest request, PepResponse response)
          This method is used to apply post-decision custom processing to the PepResponse after it has been returned from the PepRequest.decide() method.
 

Uses of PepResponse in org.openliberty.openaz.pep
 

Classes in org.openliberty.openaz.pep that implement PepResponse
 class PepResponseImpl
          PepResponse is the main entry point for processing the results of a PepRequestImpl.decide() call.
 

Methods in org.openliberty.openaz.pep that return PepResponse

          Create a PepResponse from an AzResponseContext
 PepResponse PepResponseFactoryImpl.createPepResponse(java.util.Set<AzResourceActionAssociation> actionResourceAssociations, PepRequest pepRequest, boolean queryAllowed)
          Create a PepResponse for a query that has returned a Set as opposed to decide() or queryVerbose() which return AzResponseContext
 PepResponse PepRequestImpl.decide()
          Calls the AzService for a decision and returns the information to the caller in the form of a PepResponse
 PepResponse DefaultDecisionHandler.decide(PepRequest request)
          Implements the decide() method by using the underlying AzService.decide(requestContext) method to execute the request, and handles the AzResponseContext that is returned by wrapping it in a PepResponse.
